user_query: I want to estimate the ownership cost for my car over the next 5 years and get its market value.

TaskList.description: Estimate the annual maintenance and repair costs based on the car model and age.
Calculate the insurance costs for the car over 5 years.
Determine the fuel costs for driving 12,000 miles annually, considering the car's fuel efficiency.
Estimate the depreciation of the car's value over the next 5 years.
Find the current market value of the car using its VIN.
Compile the results from subtasks 1-4 and add the estimated market value from subtask 5 to provide total ownership costs.
